rows.label: qst650201_msg0001
rows.name: Dadapon! Tora is here!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0002
rows.name: Dadapon said he got letter for Tora?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0003
rows.name: That right!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0004
rows.name:
Very strange letter, meh...
No name of sender!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0005
rows.name: Shady-shady...

rows.label: qst650201_msg0006
rows.name: Letter inside even more shady! Look.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0007
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst650201_msg0008
rows.name: "Dear...Tora..."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0009
rows.name:
Handwriting so terrible that
Tora lost interest in reading.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0010
rows.name:
Whoever wrote this definitely few
Nopon doubloons short of hoard.
But Tatezo advise read on.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0011
rows.name: OK, Dadapon.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0012
rows.name: "Dear Tora,"

rows.label: qst650201_msg0013
rows.name: "Gather following...data of Blades..."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0014
rows.name:
"and input...into Poopi."
Tora guess that mean Hana.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0015
rows.name:
"Then go to...Bulge Harbor..."
Tora think it say Bulge Harbor,
anyway.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0016
rows.name: "In Superbia."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0017
rows.name: Well, that's definitely mysterious.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0018
rows.name:
Do you have any idea who it might
be from, Tora?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0019
rows.name: No sender... Perhaps a friend?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0020
rows.name:
Tora have no friends with such
sloppy handwriting!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0021
rows.name:
But must be someone Tora know. They
know all about Tora and Poopi. Hana.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0022
rows.name: Masterpon is interested in who it is?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0023
rows.name: Of course Tora interested!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0024
rows.name:
Well then, why don't we just try doing
what the letter says?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0025
rows.name: Really? Is that OK?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0026
rows.name: Of course, Tora!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0027
rows.name:
I'm sure gathering this Blade data
it mentions will be no trouble if
we all pitch in!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0028
rows.name:
I wouldn't make any promises until
we hear what the extent of our task is.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0029
rows.name:
*sigh* OK, Tora will endure more
terrible handwriting to read details
to friends.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0030
rows.name:
"From plain Ether Cannon-using
girl Blade, data on Beam Barrage
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0031
rows.name:
"From plain Knuckle Claw-using
boy Blade, data on Assault Rush
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0032
rows.name:
"From plain Twin Rings-using
doggy Blade, data on Dual Fang
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0033
rows.name:
"From plain Greataxe-using
boy Blade, data on Axe Throw
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0034
rows.name:
"From plain Shield Hammer-using
girl Blade, data on Aerial Shield
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0035
rows.name:
"From plain Bitball-using
girl Blade, data on Flash Bomb
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0036
rows.name:
"From plain Megalance-using
giant Blade, data on Beam Halberd
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0037
rows.name:
"From plain Chroma Katana-using
boy Blade, data on Multi-Raid
Special."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0038
rows.name:
It say we need all those 8
pieces of data.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0039
rows.name: Phew, tall order.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0040
rows.name: But Rex-Rex promised!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0041
rows.name: *groan*

rows.label: qst650201_msg0042
rows.name:
No, it's fine. We'll do it!
Piece of cake!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0043
rows.name: Yay! Rex-Rex is hero among men-men!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0044
rows.name: Don't worry, Rex.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0045
rows.name: The rest of us shall lend our assistance.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0046
rows.name:
Meleph is also hero among men-men!
With friends helping, task should
be easy-peasy lemon squeezy.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0047
rows.name: ...among whom?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0048
rows.name: Uh, right then, shall we get gatherin'?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0049
rows.name:
When we're done we have to head
to Bulge Harbor, right?

rows.label: qst650201_msg0050
rows.name:
That what letter say.
Task is many so Tora divvy them up
into smaller bunches. We do in order!

rows.label: qst650201_msg0051
rows.name: OK Dadapon, we get going.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0052
rows.name:
Don't know what kind of strange
Nopon wait at end of quest, so
must be careful.

rows.label: qst650201_msg0101
rows.name: "Dear Tora,"

rows.label: qst650201_msg0102
rows.name:
"Gather following data of Blades
and input into Poopi..."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0103
rows.name: "and input into Poopi."

rows.label: qst650201_msg0104
rows.name:
"Then go to Bulge Harbor in
Superbia."
